title: Digital Marketing Show Mid-Term
desc: We know that a lot can change in just one month in the digital space - make that 12 months and you?ve got some serious differences from one Digital Marketing Show to the next. With our digital world evolving at such rapid pace, marketers need to be prepared to rethink, reorganise and refresh. The Digital Marketing Show Refresh is a one-day pop-up conference, designed specifically for marketing professionals, to make sense of the ever-changing digital landscape.
